S3_utils module¶

S3_utils.create_local_bucket(**kwargs)¶
S3_utils.get_s3_client()¶
S3_utils.initialize_database(**kwargs)¶
S3_utils.s3_bucket_init()¶

Initializes the S3 bucket by performing the following tasks: 1. Creates a local bucket. 2. Uploads blog text to the S3 bucket. 3. Initializes the database. 4. Updates the database with S3 URLs. Returns: None
